dk.statsbiblioteket.util.qa
Interface Report

All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicReport, HTMLReport
@QAInfo(state=QA_NEEDED,
        level=NORMAL)
public interface Report

Output handler for the PackageScanner. The default output goes to System.out but this can be changed with setOutputStream(java.io.OutputStream).

See Also:
HTMLReport

Method Summary
 void add(ReportElement element)
          Add a ReportElement to the report.
 void end()
          Make sure the report is properly ended.
 void setOutputStream(java.io.OutputStream out)
          Set the stream to use for output.
 

Method Detail

add

void add(ReportElement element)
Add a ReportElement to the report. Note that the ReportElement.getQAInfo() returns null in case no QAInfo annotation is present on the element.

Parameters:
element - element to add

end

void end()
Make sure the report is properly ended. No more elements will be added beyond this point.

setOutputStream

void setOutputStream(java.io.OutputStream out)
Set the stream to use for output. Default is System.out.

Parameters:
out - output stream to print the report to
